operation

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • operation.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Preforms operations for the students' data tab.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copyDB()
      Creates a copy of the connected database at the location the user specifies from the file chooser message dialog.
      static void deleteSQL(int selectedRow)
      Deletes the specified table row from the database.

      Inserts a new row into the database with specified student data.

      Sets the location of the connected database to the location the user specifies from the file chooser message dialog.

      Updates the database at the specified table row from the data entered in the text fields and combo boxes.

      Updates the database at the specified table row from the data entered directly into the student table.
      static void updateHours(java.lang.String hoursChangeStr, int selectedRow, java.lang.String operation)
      Adds, subtracts, or sets the specified hours to/from the student at the specified row in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • updateHours

        public static void updateHours(java.lang.String hoursChangeStr,
                               int selectedRow,
                               java.lang.String operation)
        Adds, subtracts, or sets the specified hours to/from the student at the specified row in the database.
        Parameters:
        hoursChangeStr - The hour amount to update
        selectedRow - The selected table row
        operation - The operation to be performed, can be + (add), - (subtract), or set

      • updateDB

        public static void updateDB(java.lang.String idStr,
                            java.lang.String fName,
                            java.lang.String lName,
                            java.lang.String gradeStr,
                            java.lang.String hoursStr,
                            java.lang.String csaCat,
                            int selectedRow)
        Updates the database at the specified table row from the data entered in the text fields and combo boxes.
        Parameters:
        idStr - The ID to change the ID at the specified row to
        fName - The first name to change the fist name at the specified row to
        lName - The last name to change the last name at the specified row to
        gradeStr - The grade to change the grade at the specified row
        hoursStr - The hour to change the hour at the specified row to
        csaCat - The CSA category to change the CSA category at the specified row
        selectedRow - The table row to update

      • updateDBFromTbl

        public static void updateDBFromTbl(java.lang.String idStr,
                                   java.lang.String fName,
                                   java.lang.String lName,
                                   java.lang.String gradeStr,
                                   java.lang.String hoursStr,
                                   java.lang.String csaCat,
                                   int selectedRow)
        Updates the database at the specified table row from the data entered directly into the student table.
        Parameters:
        idStr - The ID to change the ID at the specified row to
        fName - The first name to change the fist name at the specified row to
        lName - The last name to change the last name at the specified row to
        gradeStr - The grade to change the grade at the specified row to
        hoursStr - The hour to change the hour at the specified row to
        csaCat - The CSA category to change the CSA category at the specified row to
        selectedRow - The table row to update

      • insertDB

        public static void insertDB(java.lang.String idStr,
                            java.lang.String fName,
                            java.lang.String lName,
                            java.lang.String gradeStr,
                            java.lang.String hoursStr,
                            java.lang.String csaCat)
        Inserts a new row into the database with specified student data.
        Parameters:
        idStr - ID of the student to insert, must be unique
        fName - First name of the student to insert
        lName - Last name of the student to insert
        gradeStr - Grade of the student to insert
        hoursStr - Hours of the student to insert
        csaCat - CSA category of the student to insert

      • deleteSQL

        public static void deleteSQL(int selectedRow)
        Deletes the specified table row from the database.
        Parameters:
        selectedRow - Table row to delete

      • copyDB

        public static void copyDB()
        Creates a copy of the connected database at the location the user specifies from the file chooser message dialog.

      • setDBLocation

        public static void setDBLocation()
        Sets the location of the connected database to the location the user specifies from the file chooser message dialog.
